channel.title: Scripts?
channel.description: well i was told by Kayla (not good enough) about some scripts for moparscape 3.2 /w aryan, and i was wonderin wat scripts? for useing stuff right and obs? i dunno. i like use a wepon like a dagger and click on stab attack but i dont stab! i slash!, but and i use like a hally i use one handed and bows i slash with, i can use shield with bow and hally, so any ideas? and how do i spawn mobs? also armors dont defend me like if i had ful dragon on, id STILL get hit with gaurds, same as no armor on, so i really want to use the wepons right and fight lots of strong mobs
